scenario_text.value: (Huh? Over there, that’s Shuuji and Ryo?!)

Hey, now! You can’t just scavenge whatever
you want from the shop’s goods!

You call a run-down place like this a shop?
Besides, there ain’t no one here to care.
But that doesn’t justify—!
What’s going on?

You have to hear me out, Takuma! Ryo’s
scrounging around...
I’m just looking for useful stuff, is all.
Like you’ll find anything like that here!
You never know, dammit!

Get that stick out of your ass. What’re rules
gonna help in a do-or-die situation?

There’s always a time and place for reason!
That’s how people do things!
Don’t start fighting now!

This isn’t a fight! It’s an exchange of
ideas!
We’re just talking!

If you’re gonna go that far, then it’s a race
to see who finds more useful stuff.

By all means! I’ll prove just how important
it is to keep a level head!
Aaand they’re off...

(They called it a race, but the two of them
are searching together. Is that good or bad?)

An ice cream bowl? Doubt there’s any frosty
goodness in there, though.
Oh! But something’s inside, Takuma!
Really?!
Yeah, look! I bet we can use this!

Oh... Thank goodness, I hate to think what
I’d do if it was melted ice cream.
